title: HAP 13 - Renewing the Faith - the Sokoto Caliphate
itunes:title: HAP 13 - Renewing the Faith - the Sokoto Caliphate
description: Uthman Dan Fodio and his family were scholars, poets, and warriors whose jihad in 19th century Nigeria created the Sokoto Caliphate.
content:encoded: Uthman Dan Fodio and his family were scholars, poets, and warriors whose jihad in 19th century Nigeria created the Sokoto Caliphate.

itunes:summary: Uthman Dan Fodio and his family were scholars, poets, and warriors whose jihad in 19th century Nigeria created the Sokoto Caliphate.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
